entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, 1.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
